channel.title: Shops
channel.description: how do i make it where a shop cant sell something unless ive sold them one of that item like they dont restock on items but only sell the amount that you sell to them

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m pretty sure every pi has a “I buy anything” shop, and it’s cfg looks like:

shop = 1 I_Buy_Anything 1 1
See those 2 1’s? Those are what determine what the shop can and can’t do.
I believe the first one is for buying and the second is for selling. I can’t remember personally.

If you respond back complaining you don’t have a pi or something, don’t blame me. You didn’t give us any info about what source, base, or client you’re using.

Read full topic
